title: Corona Label help
content: I'm doing a parody Corona label knockoff for a client. Does anyone know the face for the words "Corona" and "Extra"? Thanks!
author: carlc

comments.content:
Hi Carl,

the blackletter? We had that one [before](http://web.archive.org/web/20110426120011/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36015).

Or this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110426120011im_/http:/typophile.com/files/b_4909.png)

A sample always helps.

F
Thanks for the link Florian! Much appreciated.
